old:
アーク調査隊が予定を過ぎても戻らなかったため覚
者のひとりが派遣された

　負傷者はあったが、全員帰還することができてまず
は胸を撫で下ろしている。調査団長に任命されたクラ
ウスが好奇心に負けたことが原因だ。その結果、団員
と護衛隊を危険に晒してしまったようだ

　クラウスの性格からして悪意などなかったことはわ
かっている。厳重注意ということで関係者の理解を得
られたことと考えている

　さて、正式な報告書に先駆けて聞いたところによる
と、アークは明らかな人工物であり、内部には不可思
議な装置が設置されていたとのこと

　アーク及び装置の目的は不明だが、人工物とあれ
ば、作った者がいるはずだ。とある名前が頭に浮かん
だが、今しばらく黙っていよう。まだ謎が多い

　その者の名を出すことは謎を増やすだけで解明の足
しにはならないだろう
new:
Due to the fact that the Ark exploration team did not return even after exceeding the scheduled time, one of the Arisen was dispatched.

Although there were injuries, everyone was able to return safely, and they are relieved. Klaus, who was appointed as the leader of the investigation team, was driven by curiosity, which resulted in endangering the members and the escort team.

Considering Klaus' personality, there was no malice involved. It is believed that understanding was obtained through strict warning.

Now, according to preliminary information before the formal report, it appears that the Ark is clearly an artificial object, and there were mysterious devices installed inside.

The purpose of the Ark and the devices is unknown, but if it is an artificial object, there must be someone who created it. A certain name came to mind, but let's stay silent for now. There are still many mysteries.

Mentioning the name of that person will only increase the number of puzzles and will not contribute to solving them.
